predictions.text: U.S. Real GDP (SAAR, QoQ) for Q3 2025 will print between 1.8% and 3.0% in the BEA advance estimate.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify the 'advance' estimate in the BEA GDP news release for Q3 2025 (Table 1). If delayed, use the first official Q3 2025 SAAR figure BEA publishes.
predictions.rationale: Mixed consumption and manufacturing data with easing inflation implies moderate growth into Q3.

predictions.text: Seasonally adjusted U.S. initial jobless claims (weekly level) will print at or above 240,000 in at least one report.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check the Department of Labor’s Unemployment Insurance Weekly Claims press release; use the headline 'Initial claims, seasonally adjusted' level.
predictions.rationale: Cooling labor demand and policy uncertainty increase the chance of a claims pop.

predictions.text: The S&P 500 Index (^GSPC) will close up at least 2.0% day-over-day on at least one UTC trading day.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use official S&P DJI or Yahoo Finance (^GSPC) close-to-close percentage change; day defined in UTC.
predictions.rationale: Earnings season and macro catalysts can trigger relief rallies and sharp up-days.

predictions.text: EUR/USD (EURUSD=X) will trade at or above 1.1200 on at least one UTC trading day.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm intraday high on Yahoo Finance EURUSD=X (or equivalent reputable feed) with timestamps in UTC.
predictions.rationale: Softer U.S. yields and steady Eurozone data could nudge EUR higher.

predictions.text: Bitcoin (BTC-USD) will trade at or above $75,000 on at least one UTC day.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use BTC-USD intraday high from Coinbase or Yahoo Finance; day measured in UTC.
predictions.rationale: ETF demand and benign macro could lift BTC toward cycle highs.

predictions.text: The Brent–WTI front-month settlement spread will reach at or below $3.00 per barrel on at least one trading day.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute the difference using ICE Brent and NYMEX WTI prompt-month official settlements on the same trade date.
monitoring_signals: North Sea and U.S. pipeline flows
predictions.rationale: Stronger WTI from Cushing draws/export strength can compress the spread.

predictions.text: ICE Endex Dutch TTF front-month natural gas will settle at or above €45.00/MWh on at least one trading day.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use ICE Endex official settlement price for the nearest (front) month on the trade date.
predictions.rationale: Early-winter cold or supply disruptions can push TTF higher despite ample storage.

predictions.text: U.S. CPI Owners’ Equivalent Rent (OER, MoM, SA) for October 2025 will be at or below 0.35% in the BLS release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in BLS CPI Detailed Report (series CUSR0000SEHC, MoM SA) released for October 2025.
monitoring_signals: Shelter diffusion indices in CPI microdata
predictions.rationale: New-lease rent cooling continues to filter into OER with lags.

predictions.text: Euro area HICP excluding energy and food (YoY, flash) for October 2025 will print between 2.6% and 3.1%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Eurostat’s HICP flash press release for October 2025; core measure defined as excluding energy and food.
predictions.rationale: Core disinflation persists but remains above target.

predictions.text: NVIDIA (NVDA) Q3 FY2026 Data Center segment revenue year-over-year growth will be between 35% and 60%, per the company’s earnings release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check NVIDIA’s Q3 FY2026 press release/10-Q segment disclosures; compute YoY growth for the Data Center segment from reported figures.
predictions.rationale: Growth decelerates from extraordinary highs amid product transitions and supply constraints.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, OFAC will announce at least one new sanctions designation targeting a Venezuelan state-owned enterprise, ministry, or senior official.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm via U.S. Treasury OFAC press releases and SDN list updates explicitly under the Venezuela sanctions program.
monitoring_signals: Venezuelan domestic actions and election dynamics
predictions.rationale: Rising regional tensions and U.S. political pressure raise sanction odds.

predictions.text: The U.S. 5-Year TIPS breakeven inflation rate (FRED: T5YIE) will close at or below 2.10% on at least one trading day (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use the FRED series T5YIE daily close; trading day considered on a UTC basis.
monitoring_signals: Real yields and nominal curve moves
predictions.rationale: Easing inflation data and growth concerns can pull breakevens lower.
